Title: Archived Fact-Checked Media ‚Äî MediaVault (1)

Description: ‚ÄúFrance and Denmark are sending troops to Greenland to prepare for attack from Donald Trump. external_links_info.description: A YouTube channel described the footage as "Danish & American diplomats" arriving in Nuuk, Greenland, but an X user said it showed, "About 100 police officers with 3 police dogs arrived to Nuuk, Greenland from Denmark."

Hj√∏rdis Joanardottir Poulsen, a Greenland Police spokesperson, pointed to a March 24 press release that, when translated to English, said Greenland Police "requested assistance from Danish police districts" to manage the delegation of U.S. visitors.

A Denmark Ministry of Defense spokesperson pointed us to the Danish media company DR‚Äôs March 23 report that said Danish police officers were on the way to Nuuk, Greenland, ahead of the U.S. delegation‚Äôs visit.
